plotSwitch.name: quick plot switch
plotSwitch.description: Set a pair of keys to switch through the plots of a player.

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: Activates or disables the functionality of this addon.

natureSubConfig.name: Show plot borders on CB Nature
natureSubConfig.description: Settings for the rendered borders on CB Nature and Extreme.

borderRadius.name: radius
borderRadius.description: Sets the distance around you where the borders should shall appear.

borderheight.name: height
borderheight.description: Sets the height for the border lines.

hopperSubConfig.name: hoppers
hopperSubConfig.description: Automates the settings within the hopper menu.

filterItem.name: filter item
filterItem.description: Sets the first item in your hotbar as filter item.

radius.name: radius
radius.description: Sets the radius for the hopper to catch items. -1 means no change.

finalAction.name: final action
finalAction.description: Sets the last action to execute.

stackSize.name: stack size
stackSize.description: Which stack size should the hopper pass each tick.

swordsSubConfig.name: automatic sword
swordsSubConfig.description: Put your Bonze or BIRTH sword into your first slot, your arrows into your second slot and a bow into the third slot of your hotbar. After you fired an arrow, the sword will be selected and after a set cooldown the bow will be selected again.

HABKcooldown.name: switch cooldown
HABKcooldown.description: The time in ms until the bow will be selected.

VABKloadTime.name: loading time
VABKloadTime.description: the higher the value, the higher the arrow will fly. Lower values increase the shot rate by far,

VABKswitchCooldown.name: switch cooldown
VABKswitchCooldown.description: The time until the next arrow will be loaded.

VABKhotkey.name: hotkey
VABKhotkey.description: With this hotkey you can toggle the full automatic sword.

typeCorrection.name: type correction
typeCorrection.description: This will prevent you from common typing errors like 7ec, (msg or t/r

messageSplit.name: /msg splitter
messageSplit.description: Splits a /msg or /r message into multiple messages if it is longer than the 100 character limit of GrieferGames.

hideNews.name: hide news
hideNews.description: Removes the GrieferGames news ticker from the chat.

antiFakeMoney.name: anti fake money
antiFakeMoney.description: Verifies incoming payments and detects fake money.

cooldownNotifier.name: cooldown notification
cooldownNotifier.description: Shows a notification as soon as a cooldown like /wand /rand /boden /sign /anticopy is over.

cleanChat.name: clean chat
cleanChat.description: GrieferGames sends some unimportant messages in the chat. This function removes such messages and makes the chat much cleaner.

hideEmptyLines.name: hide empty lines
hideEmptyLines.description: Removes empty lines from the chat.

muteStreamer.name: remove streamer messages
muteStreamer.description: removes the messages that appear, when a streamer goes live.

itemProtection.name: item protection
itemProtection.description: Prevents you from using expensive farming items like Bonze Klinge, Birth Klinge, Birth Bogen, placing of SoS. CAUTION! This function will only work for clicks performed by the user. Software based clicks (performed by an auto clicker) will still damage or set your item.

showCompTooltip.name: tooltip info for compressed items
showCompTooltip.description: Hover over compressed items or blocks to see how many double chests, stacks and single items the item contains.

showAdventurerTooltip.name: tooltip info for adventurer tools
showAdventurerTooltip.description: Hover over an adventurer tool to see your farming progress in percent and the remaining number in double chests, stacks and single items.

nextPlot.name: next plot
nextPlot.description: Go to the next plot (/p h <player> +1)

previousPlot.name: previous plot
previousPlot.description: Go to the previous plot (/p h <player> -1)

autoCrafterConfig.name: Auto-crafter & auto-(de)compressor
autoCrafterConfig.description:
There are 2 different Autocrafters:

V1 uses the Vanilla Crafting menu (Workbench). Place your recipe in the Workbench and save with SHIFT + ENTER. Then press ENTER to craft the recipe.

V2 uses the /recipes menu. Place the item you want to craft in your first hotbar slot. Then type /autocraft in the chat. The /recipes menu will open automatically and craft your items.

endlessMode.name: Endless mode
endlessMode.description: Can be toggled on or off with ENTER. If this option is disabled, ENTER must be manually pressed to craft a batch.

finalActionV2.name: Final action
finalActionV2.description: Specifies whether, when using Autocrafter V2 (/autocraft), the crafted items should be dropped or compressed in the inventory.

finalActionV3.name: Final action
finalActionV3.description: Specifies whether, when using Autocrafter V3 (/craftV3), the crafted items should be dropped or compressed in the inventory.

delay.name: delay
delay.description: If it is buggy increase the delay to make it slower.

itemSaver.item_saver_message_sword: This sword is too valuable to use it!
itemSaver.item_saver_message_sos: This pumpkin doesn't want to be placed!
itemSaver.item_saver_message_birth_bow: This bow is too valuable to shoot with it!

payAll.amountTooLow: The rounded amount per player is $0!

autoCrafter.recipeSavedV3: Recipe saved! Now open all chests for the source material.
autoCrafter.noItemFound: Put the item you want to craft into the first slot.
autoCrafter.setChestForMaterial: Source chest for %s has been set.
autoCrafter.mixedChest: This chest contains several items and can't be used as source chest.
autoCrafter.chooseVariant: There are several possible recipes for this item. Please select one and press ENTER
